references.reason: This paper initiated the study of clustering under limited supervision, which is the basis for this paper's study of clustering with queries.
This paper is highly relevant as it studies clustering with pair-wise queries, which is a closely related problem to the subset queries studied in this paper.

references.paper_title: A theoretical analysis of first heuristics of crowdsourced entity resolution
references.reason: This paper is highly relevant as it studies clustering with side information and is a closely related problem to the subset queries studied in this paper.

references.paper_title: Predicting signed edges with o(n1+0(1) log n) queries
references.reason: This paper is relevant because it studies a related problem of signed edge prediction using queries, which is relevant to the non-adaptive query setting studied in this paper.

references.paper_title: Correlation clustering with same-cluster queries bounded by optimal cost
references.reason: This paper is relevant because it studies a closely related problem of correlation clustering using same-cluster queries, which is relevant to the non-adaptive query setting studied in this paper.
